mapper.select: select id,serial_num as serialNum,title,fd_process as fdProcess,securities_regulatory as securitiesRegulatory, (select label_name from maa_conf_label t1 where t1.label_code = 'SFC' and t1.label_value = securities_regulatory and t1.status = '1') as securitiesRegulatoryText, if_relevance as ifRelevance,fd_keyword as fdKeyword,company_name as companyName,company_short_name as companyShortName, corporate_representative as corporateRepresentative,founding_time as foundingTime, register_provience as registerProvience, (select area_name from provinces t1 where t1.area_no = register_provience and t1.status = '1') as registerProvienceText, register_city as registerCity, (select area_name from provinces t1 where t1.area_no = register_city and t1.status = '1') as registerCityText, register_area as registerArea, (select area_name from provinces t1 where t1.area_no = register_area and t1.status = '1') as registerAreaText, address,establish_time as establishTime, business_provience as businessProvience, (select area_name from provinces t1 where t1.area_no = business_provience and t1.status = '1') as businessProvienceText, business_city as businessCity, (select area_name from provinces t1 where t1.area_no = business_city and t1.status = '1') as businessCityText, business_area as businessArea, (select area_name from provinces t1 where t1.area_no = business_area and t1.status = '1') as businessAreaText, phone,plate, (select label_name from maa_conf_label t1 where t1.label_code = 'IPO_PLATE' and t1.label_value = plate and t1.status = '1') as plateText, main_business as mainBusiness,business_scope as businessScope,open_flag as openFlag from ipo_fd_case t where t.id = #{id}
SELECT id, bid, intermediary_type, org_type, org_name, org_code, valid_flag, represent_person, agent_person, assist_person, sort_no FROM ipo_intermediary_org WHERE bid = #{bid}

SELECT id, bid, market_type, (select label_name from maa_conf_label t1 where t1.label_code = 'IPO_CAPITAL_MARKET' and t1.label_value = market_type and t1.status = '1') as market_type_text, company_code, company_name, list_time, delist_time FROM ipo_other_market_info WHERE bid = #{bid}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t3.title AS caseTitle, t3.id AS caseId, t4.process_time, DATE_FORMAT(t4.process_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS processTime, t3.open_flag AS openFlag FROM ipo_fd_case t1 left join ipo_fd_relevance t2 on t1.id = t2.fd_bid,ipo_case t3 left join ipo_process t4 on t4.bid = t3.id and t4.status = '1',case_common_status_info t5 WHERE t2.bid = t3.id AND t5.case_id = t3.id AND t5.case_type = '04' AND t5.release_flag = '1' AND t1.id = #{id} ORDER BY t4.pro_sort LIMIT 999999) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t3.id, t4.iec_result AS iecResult, ( SELECT t5.label_name FROM maa_conf_label t5 WHERE t5.label_code = 'IPO_VERIFY_RESULT' AND t5.label_value = t4.iec_result AND t5.status = '1') AS iecResultText, t4.pro_sort AS proSort FROM ipo_fd_case t1 left join ipo_fd_relevance t2 on t1.id = t2.fd_bid,ipo_case t3 left join ipo_process t4 on t4.bid = t3.id and t4.iec_result IS NOT NULL and t4.status = '1' WHERE t2.bid = t3.id AND t1.id = #{id} and t4.status = '1' ) b ON a.caseId = b.id ORDER BY b.proSort DESC LIMIT 9999) t GROUP BY t.caseId
